name: Timeline Photos
caption:
UX Designer internship @ Simpleia
For now we will not be able to wait for the HCI Course that will take 3 months, but you can take the course while you are here with us getting paid for it and involved in real UX projects.

We need someone who is really interested in UX, passionated by how people actually uses stuff and how they feel about it, the kind of person who is really annoying of how many comments you will hear from him commenting on stuff around him and how it effects peoples life's.

jobs@simpleia.com
